comments:
To reproduce:
Create a managed-make project
Open up the C/C++ Build property page
Click Manage... by the Configuration box
Create a New configuration.
Try to create another new configuration - OK button is never enabled. 

Meanwhile, a class-cast exception has been recorded in error log...

java.lang.ClassCastException
at
org.eclipse.cdt.managedbuilder.ui.properties.NewConfigurationDialog.isSimilarName(NewConfigurationDialog.java:327)
at
org.eclipse.cdt.managedbuilder.ui.properties.NewConfigurationDialog.validateState(NewConfigurationDialog.java:390)
at
org.eclipse.cdt.managedbuilder.ui.properties.NewConfigurationDialog.access$0(NewConfigurationDialog.java:380)
at
org.eclipse.cdt.managedbuilder.ui.properties.NewConfigurationDialog$1.modifyText(NewConfigurationDialog.java:176)
at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TypedListener.handleEvent(TypedListener.java:187)
at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.EventTable.sendEvent(EventTable.java:82)
Also, just for fun on Linux each character typed in the second name appears twice...

There was an arraylist of strings that in some places was correctly treated as a
list of strings and in others incorrectly treated as a list of configurations. 
The fix seems straightforward:

Index: org.eclipse.cdt.managedbuilder.ui/NewConfigurationDialog.java
===================================================================
RCS file:
/cvs/uksw/eclipse/patches/org.eclipse.cdt.managedbuilder.ui/NewConfigurationDialog.java,v
retrieving revision 1.1
diff -u -r1.1 NewConfigurationDialog.java
--- org.eclipse.cdt.managedbuilder.ui/NewConfigurationDialog.java	14 Mar 2005
11:03:57 -0000	1.1
+++ org.eclipse.cdt.managedbuilder.ui/NewConfigurationDialog.java	14 Mar 2005
11:10:29 -0000
@@ -74,7 +74,7 @@
 	/**
 	 * @param parentShell
 	 * @param managedTarget
-	 * @param nameList A list of names that have been added by the user but have
not yet been added to the target 
+	 * @param nameList A list of names (Strings) that have been added by the user
but have not yet been added to the target 
 	 * @param title The title of the dialog
 	 */
 	protected NewConfigurationDialog(Shell parentShell, IManagedProject
managedProject, ArrayList nameList, String title) {
@@ -324,7 +324,7 @@
 		}
 		Iterator iter = reservedNames.listIterator();
 		while (iter.hasNext()) {
-			if (((IConfiguration)iter.next()).getName().equalsIgnoreCase(newName)) {
+			if (((String)iter.next()).equalsIgnoreCase(newName)) {
 				return true;
 			}
 		}

Leo,
  I'll grab it.  The patch looks right.
And I have the branch already checkout.

Hi Alain,

The patch looks correct to me also.  Thanks!

(In reply to comment #4)
